languages.text: Хотя вам удалось обезвредить бомбу, бедолага скончался от глубоких ран — из-под его одежды вываливаются окровавленные кишки. Чудо, что он вообще так долго продержался.

traits.locale_text: Хотя вам удалось обезвредить бомбу, бедолага скончался от глубоких ран — из-под его одежды вываливаются окровавленные кишки. Чудо, что он вообще так долго продержался.

languages.text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.
languages.original_text: Хотя вам удалось обезвредить бомбу, бедолага скончался от глубоких ран — из-под его одежды вываливаются окровавленные кишки. Чудо, что он вообще так долго продержался.

traits.locale_text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are falling out of his clothes. It's a miracle he even lasted this long.

Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.

languages.text: Aunque has conseguido desactivar la bomba, el pobre hombre ha muerto a consecuencia de sus heridas. Sus entrañas ensangrentadas escapan de entre su ropa. Es un milagro que haya sobrevivido tanto tiempo.
languages.original_text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.

languages.text: 無事に爆弾を解除することはできたものの、哀れな同胞はその深い傷がもとで死んでしまった。血塗れの内臓が服からこぼれだしている。彼がここまで持ちこたえられたことがそもそも奇跡だ。
languages.original_text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.

languages.text: 尽管你顺利拆除了炸弹，但这个可怜的家伙还是由于伤重而死，血迹斑斑的内脏从他的衣服上淌了下来。他能坚持这么久，真是个奇迹。
languages.original_text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.

languages.text: Du hast die Bombe zwar entschärft, aber der arme Bursche ist seinen schweren Verletzungen erlegen. Blutiges Gedärm sickert durch seine Gewänder. Es ist ein Wunder, dass er so lange durchgehalten hat.
languages.original_text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.

languages.text: Bien que vous ayez réussi à désamorcer la bombe, le pauvre homme a succombé à ses blessures. Ses vêtements dégoulinent de sang. C'est un miracle qu'il ait tenu aussi longtemps.
languages.original_text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.

languages.text: Bombayı başarılı bir şekilde imha etsen de zavallı adam, derin yaraları nedeniyle can verdi. Dışarı çıkan kanlı iç organları giysilerinden görünüyor. Bu kadar uzun süre dayanması bile mucize.
languages.original_text: Although you successfully defused the bomb, the poor fellow has died of his deep wounds. Bloodied entrails are dribbling out of his clothes. It is a miracle he even lasted this long.
